title: Questlove | Zelenskyy Delivers Moving Address to Congress as Putin's Invasion Sputters: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy delivering a virtual address to Congress as Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine continues to sputter, leaving hope that there can be a diplomatic solution to the conflict.

Then, Questlove talks about his Oscar-nominated documentary Summer of Soul, waking up way too early for the nomination announcement and Steven Spielberg gushing over the film.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
